subject: Dear,E-mail Owner: Susan
body:
Dear,E-mail Owner: Susan 
 
Message From Western Union Team Service,Headquarter Australia,45 Clarence St L 22,Sydney,New South Wales,2000,Australia,I am hereby just to brief you that Western Union Team Service,Headquarter,Sydney,Australia,received the total amount sum of US$10.5Miion, from United States of America Dollars Only,as compensation funds and instruction given was to paid you the reference funds due to list among failed into scams victims,and i wish to make you understand something in life that you failed to realize,I want you to have at the back of your mind that all this while you have been dealing with all the fake people,claiming to be officials company,I have never slept a day without being worried about your issue since I entered into this custody of Western Union Money Transfer, I have been keeping this as a secret,but I want to open up to you at this very moment avoid Judgment day in the present of Almighty God, about what holding you not to received your stated mentioned funds for a very long time, paying your earned money without result is because of (Authorization Funds Merit Claims Permit) and I want you to do me a favor by keep this issue secret. 
 
For your sake just to be honest and integrity,I am praying day and night towards this your stated mentioned funds,and once i sight mine eyes on your compensation fund worth total amount sum of US$10.5Million,upon the money you has spends yet no results conclusion,and I believed that God use someone to save somebody, as the matter of urgency with the hope that this transfer have come to the end for you to receive your payment as I took this bold step, what I mostly needed from you is honest and integrity is to keeping this secret and confidential,for you to received the reference below funds,as the United States of America instructed Western Union Team Service,Headquarter Australia,45 Clarence St L 22,Sydney,New South Wales,2000,Australia,to paid you the funds. 
 
Right now, this might interest you to know the main reason while I keep on exposed below reference issue to you today just to be awareness about what really holding your payment,upon all the monies you have paid is (Authorization Funds Merit Claims Permit),is what holding your funds,and there is no ways the expecting mentioned funds worth sum of US$10,500,000,00,compensation would ever paid to you,without you paid for the document mentioned,looks,don't ever you ignore below messages, it is yours times for God to answer your prayer,I wouldn't say I regretted taking such step because I don’t knew how much you have also paid so far in this transaction,but my pains and agonies is much each times I saw your file form record funds,you?re always feeling cheated or swindled. 
 
Well, a times I seat down and thinks of this other way round with the firm believe that you sometimes act funny just because of the bad name and reputation of this country, also with your past experience with some of those hoodlums,but when I seat down in my office sometime and saw your payment file,I was trying to contact you personally with the hope of helping you out of the mess you have faced so far with those criminals, but I still understand partially that you are still somewhat believing in those hoodlum?s fake letters and documents, look, you need a prayer just ask God to opened your eyes well, by review a personal person to trust in order to have your fund paid to you. 
 
Considering the state of affairs at hand, I will be glad to notify you for the last time what holding your payment sake and you have also lost money too, but I want you to know our stands now because the (FBI) (EFCC),& INTERPOL,they are so concerned why I have not yet gotten this fund of yours paid to you since, but I found out that my explanation makes no sense/ or difference to them, all they are after is for me to make sure I get this done before the end of this week. Please! Please! & please! Can you help yourself out from this matter so we can forget about our agonies once and for all? Can you trust me for once for  me to trust you as well so we can work out things? I want to be plain to you so you can be plain to me as well. According to the meeting holding  last week,through Federal Court of Justice,to paid your above mentioned fund US$10,500, 000,00,if you can able to afford reference US$300.00,for the (Authorization Funds Merit Claims Permit). 
 
Be inform that your Western Union Gold ATM Debit Card is ready to be delivered to you,and 5 MTCN each $5,000,00,is available in your name to picked up,if you can able to affords the reference US$300,00,due to the (Authorization Funds Merit Claims Permit),and if you does have any interest of the claims mentioned funds,Western Union Team Service,Headquarter Australia,45 Clarence St L 22,Sydney,New South Wales,2000,Australia,would send you letter of declaration for you to signed that you re no more having any interest in making this claim, so I can forward it to the (FBI) (EFCC) & INTERPOL,but if you?re still having interested in making the claim, kindly try and send down the needed fee, so I can make all arrangement, how to towards your funds through Western Union Gold ATM Debit Card, to avoid misunderstanding each other,and options you might choose to use received your mentioned funds worth total amount sum of US$10.5Million.
Thanks 
Mr. Para Jefferson 
From Western Union Team Service, 
Headquarter Australia 45 Clarence St L 22, 
Sydney, New South Wales, 2000, Australia

subject: Re: Dear,E-mail Owner: Susan
body:
Hello Mr. Para Jefferson,

Thank you for reaching out to me from the Western Union Team. I appreciate you taking the time to explain the situation regarding my funds. I understand that there have been some issues with scams and fake officials, and I'm glad to hear that you are concerned about resolving this matter.

I must admit, though, that I am a bit confused about the Funds Merit Claims Permit you mentioned. Could you please provide more information on what exactly this permit is and why it is necessary for me to receive my funds? I want to make sure I fully understand the process before moving forward.

Additionally, you mentioned a Western Union Gold ATM Debit Card that is ready to be delivered to me. How does this card work? Will it allow me to access my funds directly?

Thank you again for your assistance in this matter. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Susan
